title: Chinese-style Braised Beef One-pot
summary: Chinese-style Braised Beef One-pot might be a good recipe to expand your main course repertoire. For $3.03 per serving, this recipe covers 31% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains approximately 50g of protein, 58g of fat, and a total of 913 calories. This recipe serves 6. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. It is a good option if you're following a dairy free diet. If you have thumb-size piece root ginger, garlic cloves, star anise, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the ginger root you could follow this main course with the Ginger Cake with Crystallized Ginger Frosting as a dessert. It is brought to you by BBC Good Food. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 2 hours and 40 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 62%, this dish is good. Try Chinese-style braised beef, How to cook: Chinese-style braised beef, and Chinese-Style Beef, Sweet Potato, and Bok Choy Stew for similar recipes.
